website_summaries.verdict: This cooktop comes with an induction cooking pot in case you're not sure whether your current cookware will work.
cons: Heat settings don't give you much control

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooker. Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I only had this cooker for a week and I've used it at least 5 times already for hot pot. I've very satisfied with my purchase. The design is simple and it heats up quickly. My only complaint is that I wish once we put it on the lock setting it won't turn off when you accidentally push the power button. I kept turning the cooker off because I would wipe it down whenever I would spill broth on it when I'm making hot pot and it would turn off. The pot could be better but it was an added bonus since most cooktops are around the same price but doesn't include a pot.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Works intermittently with codes flashing
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Works intermittently with codes flashing. Reviewing my order for warranty and return options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The temperature control is easy and has different levels to choose from. I had it for hot pot and if I had the temperature level to the highest, it heats up pretty fast. It was pretty consistent since I had the hot pot with my friends for two hours. When we slow down, we simply just turn down the temperature level to keep it barely boiled. The package is great. Foam protected the heater and the pot pretty well. I still have the box and I easily put it back when I move.
customer_reviews.author: Xitong Tan

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC.
customer_reviews.text: Dont wait. Order it now. You will not regret it. You have boiling water in 3 minutes! Fantastic product all for a great price. You DEFINITELY wont regret it. Enjoy your NEW INDUCTION COOKER WITH PAN😉 oh there is a lock function that will lock the appliance to prevent any accidental temp changes. Very pleased with the decision on the purchase. One thing the pan gets very hot. I would start off on a low temp and increase as you go. This product definitely gets hot fast and cookss fast if you go to high on ea setting be it by temp or wattage.
customer_reviews.author: HMJ

customer_reviews.title: Works well with larger pots & pans
customer_reviews.text: I use nothing but my cooktop for cooking. I really love it, with one MAJOR exception. It does not work with small diameter pots and pans. They have to be at least the diameter of the pattern on the cooktop. I have a diffuser and with or without it the small pans will not work. It throws a code and shuts off. Its a real pain to use large kettles when you only need a small one. Other than that it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it will do, which is really nice in 2020 where so many things you buy online don't. Eating hot pot is so much nicer and convenient on this versus a portable gas stove. Temperature control seems to be fairly accurate as water would boil when the temperature was set to 250F but not 200F (water boils at 212F). I can't speak for the wattage control as I don't have a wattmeter.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Poor design - spills into crevice will be difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this unit - simplified control panel compared to the newer model, smaller foot print, while providing 1800W of power. But, having the cooktop separated from the control by the plastic base is a really bad idea since spills that go into that crevice are extremely hard to clean (Eg, you accidentally let your pot boil over, and the fluids flow towards the controls and into said crevice). Would have totally kept this unit if the cooktop was completely flush and integrated with the controls (like most other induction cooktops)
customer_reviews.author: Guts

customer_reviews.title: Always E2
customer_reviews.text: Always show E2 after 5mins normal use, have checked E2 means overheat inside, but I just used the same pot shown on the picture, I think this cooker has problems and cannot cook meal at all!
customer_reviews.author: huazi08

customer_reviews.title: High failure rate!
customer_reviews.text: First one I got was broken out of the box. The digital display was totally messed up so you had no idea what the temperature was set to. They replaced it quickly. The second one I received worked once and was great. I just got it out of the box yesterday after sitting for 9 months in my cupboard. Now it turns on, but as soon as I try to select a temperature, it immediately goes to an error state and will not heat. Super unreliable :(
customer_reviews.author: Austin Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Overheats very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Except for price, there is nothing much to like about this. I had a Rosewill that I had bought 3years ago which was lot better and had more features than this. Main issue with this is - it overheats very quickly. By the time I make a few omelettes, it starts with E error codes ranging from overheating to incompatible cookware- the same one I had used last 15 minutes. Setting auto shutoff is also very tedious and it lacks preprogrammed settings which I found very useful. Definitely returning this item. I had previously owned Roswell, won't mind giving them another try with a different model
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Limited heat settings
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am happy with this cooker; however the limited number of temperature settings could be a problem. I chose this model because it has a slimmer profile and is perfect for my RV. The pan is just so so. Ridges in the bottom make it unusable for browning as the food does not come into complete contact with the cooking surface. I used it for bacon and ended up with stripped bacon. Should be ok for soups, spaghetti sauce, etc. I think I will be happy with this cooker because of the size. If size is not an issue another option might be better.
customer_reviews.author: Jean K.

customer_reviews.title: Induction cooktop
customer_reviews.text: Very good but you can not program a diferent tempetute for a diferent cooking time. For example if you want to cook rice you CAN NOT set it at once, 5 mimute to 350 F and then 20 minute to 200 F to finish cooking it. Other desavantage is to set a tempeture you have press temp bottom too many time. Default time on screen is 30 min. If you want to sei it up at 29 min yo have to press temp bttom 59 times.
customer_reviews.author: jose o diaz

customer_reviews.title: Better is out there.
customer_reviews.text: Will not buy again, cooper chef or nuwave is better. The temperature goes up in increments of 50 so it's too hot/cold. (Copper chef is Increments of 10). It's common for a error 2 code to come on and it stop working for whatever reason. The pan it comes with is so cheap it burnt first use so trashed it. Do yourself a favor, buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Totally garbage,always beep of reason E2 just after a while use,but already throw the box cann't return.So angry about bought a garbage,waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Wu

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong with the product of series rhai 1300-1600 I cooktop
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for our restaraunt ,we used this rh 1300-1600 series of cooktop for almost 2 years . It always ran into E2 a kind of error inside the machine . We tired everything we can do to figure out what's problem of this situation, and we also changed the electrical cable to see if it is the power supply didn't works well . Finally we gave up and changed another brand of cooktop and it just works. I think that is the problem of the product . I hope that you will find out what the problem is
customer_reviews.author: JIANPING XU

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: My "sister" has one and recommended getting. I love it. When we move, I want an induction stove top, I am so impressed with the hot plate. I use it on my patio to cook outdoors. Thinking it would be great travel item also.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Wow - I've been missing out
customer_reviews.text: Who knew induction cooking was so easy and good? Now I know. This is a fine, if somewhat basic product. The price is right, and so it may not have the laundry list of features that some of the other, more expensive units have, it still works perfectly well. A great introduction to the world of induction.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey H. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Very Rapid cooking
customer_reviews.text: Beware of how fast it will heat up turning around to the refrigerator to get eggs and crack and pan was already hot to fry egg as soon a sit dropped. Find settings that work best
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhh
customer_reviews.text: Gets too hot, dangerous, used only a month, few times a week.
customer_reviews.author: K Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Great, Fast heat
customer_reviews.text: This was provided as a Gift to an Adult child CHEF! He appreciated it, and has learned how to utilize an Induction surface, and may make a recommendation in the workplace(busy historic Inn kitchen). Thanks for being part of this discovery!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ouellette

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ... worked wonderfully ... nice size pot ... bought it for a "Hot Pot" BD Party celebration and then gave the BD girl the Rosewill 1800w Induction Cooker for her gift and she was thrilled! Also, the item arrived very quickly. Good product ... good value ... ease of use. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Martha B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and heating fast than other brands
customer_reviews.text: This is my secondly purchase of Indection cooking stove because the first one broken after used for a year. So l bought this one with additional insurance assuming that it is high power and can be damaged easily later. However, 5 years passed since then and it still works perfectly. In addition, I later bought another induction stove but found that it is lower power than this one. The included stainless steel cooker is lighter than other brand though but is more energy efficient because it heats quickly. I am so happy about this induction stove and thanks to Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Silicon Valley Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Super induction
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the induction cooktop about three weeks ago. It has work flawlessly the cooper chef pan works great with this unit. It has great temperature control and heats up a pot of water very quickly and is easy to use. Thank You Rosewill for making a good product. I recommend this induction cooktop.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking pastas!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our RV, really handy to boil water quickly for pastas, cook one pot meals and takes up very little room.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: COMES WITH A POT! :)
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping and it COMES WITH A POT! I must have missed that in the description! Will update my review once I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Considering getting a second one
customer_reviews.text: I love our new induction burner. It’s perfect for making lunch in our studio or preparing food for photo shoots. The pan is not particularly fabulous but it gets the job done if you know how to season and use a thin stainless steel pan.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Prowse

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for a single cooker
customer_reviews.text: I use to have an electric wire cooker, they take forever to heat up and don't get hot enough for most meals or cook evenly. THIS is instant heat, accurate temps, making for super fast meals.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Lee

customer_reviews.title: Powerful. Nice looking. No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent. Almost too powerful which isn't a problem. Just pay attention to usage instructions and watch whatever you're cooking because this works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Cannot work for a long time
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this porduct for hot pot, but it cannot work for a long time. The machine will automatic turned off when work about 20 mins, and you need wait it about 5 mins. So if you want to use for 2 hours hot pot , do not purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: brain

customer_reviews.title: Is not so good!
customer_reviews.text: Once I just used it for a while and then stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Hoo

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Temp control is in 25 degree increments, not sufficient for cooking most items. Designed to be produced cheaply.....
customer_reviews.author: tom oteri

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for coocking outside
customer_reviews.text: I love this item to save on cleaning inside the house, the pot turned black right away, make sure you put enough oil when usung it.
customer_reviews.author: joseph saab

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the pot not good
customer_reviews.text: The cooktop works good, but the quality of stainless Steel Pot is not good. The pot is very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Happiness

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Fastest and most efficient way to heat water for my daily tea.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Nice induction stove but poor stainless steel pot - change ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice induction stove but poor stainless steel pot - change shape just in one use. It is better not including the pot.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great device, flaw: smallest timer is 30 minutes if you want to use it to boil eggs and timer- you're out of luck
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great, however light flashed on the power button whenever plugged in (very annoying) and smallest timer is 30 minutes it's not a crock pot, it should have 1 minute intervals on timer (serious flaw) but other than that it is great and works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Agnew

customer_reviews.title: Good, but before you buy, consider this!
customer_reviews.text: This is good product. But if you want to buy this, consider your pan’s bottom plate. If it’s induction safe or for induction, you can use it with this induction. In my case, I have to buy pan and others compatible for this induction.
customer_reviews.author: Fred A.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as described!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, can't use this one. It's too limited to the type of cookware you can use. The one that came with it is too light and feels very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: GFD

customer_reviews.title: My tenants love these
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one of these I have bought for tenants when an electric stove burner goes out. They are way more energy efficient and way cheaper than replacing the burners.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna W.p

customer_reviews.title: Cooktop itself is very nice quality, and a really good size for counter ...
customer_reviews.text: Cooktop itself is very nice quality, and a really good size for counter tops. Pan that came with it however, marginal. Top of pan OK but pan should be non-stick. A lot of cleaning with this type.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Blaso

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: The unit works amazingly well!!! My wife couldn't believe how quickly it both heats, then cools down when it's turned off. It does everything it says on the box, is easy to use, and even comes with a pan! We're using this as our cooktop while I demo/redesign/rebuild our kitchen, and it is well worth the money!!! I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: BobT

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for hot pots
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and heats up fast! Many temperature settings to adjust how hot my pot gets.
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Heats up water in 30 seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Consumer

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like the automatic controlling of temperature!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the induction cooker's temperature control, I just can use this at 500w, when it’s over 500w, power will be shut down. So I can’t use this to cook food which needs high temperature. That time I bought this stove is cheaper than this period, maybe cause of COVID-19?
customer_reviews.author: Sura

customer_reviews.title: stop working after some time
customer_reviews.text: Its looks were nice and it did work for some time but after couple of use, It made some noise and stopped working after that. I am throwing it away and buying other better brand.
customer_reviews.author: kamlesh kumar

customer_reviews.title: Needs more finesse in the temperature control.
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to see that the controls were under glass as opposed to the flimsy plastic controls that wear out and break after 5 months that the NuWave has.... Unfortunately it does not give you a lot of control of the cooking process. When you switch to temperature control you have only 50 degree increments which, especially at the lower levels ends up with either charred veggies or steamed. You cannot braise. I use the NuWave with I need precision and finesse. I use this if I just want to pan fry meat or deep fray with oil or boil water.
customer_reviews.author: horseofcorff

customer_reviews.title: Good for hotpot
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to cook hotpot. And it works well. I am able to use it in my school dorm without fire alarm detect it. It is good for 2-5 people to enjoy hotpot.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for hot pot. Easy to clean, high efficiency. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lei Hua

customer_reviews.title: simple & easy
customer_reviews.text: work well & the power is good enough for everything. Quality also good, i have been using it everyday for 2 months, no problem, simple & easy use
customer_reviews.author: sweetjudy

customer_reviews.title: It's great, with one word of warning
customer_reviews.text: This thing heats up really fast, consider yourself warned. Other than that, it's pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Worked Very Well
customer_reviews.text: Used it for couple of times and they worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Light

customer_reviews.title: Great product that saves time
customer_reviews.text: Straightforward operation. Food is cooked faster than stove top gas or electrical ranges. One needs to pay attention to ensure that food is not overcooked. Satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: UKR

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to clean and it’s very convenient to use to do hotpot.The only issue is that it’s smaller than I expected but it’s fine
customer_reviews.author: jerryw

customer_reviews.title: Very fast cooking
customer_reviews.text: Much more efficient than gas or electric, and much faster especially with a stainless steel pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Home N Hearth

customer_reviews.title: Great cooktop
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy to use, careful with water boiling over, it’ll cause it to turn off
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: only a few types of cookers are used on this one
customer_reviews.author: Captain PAUL

customer_reviews.title: Very Efficient
customer_reviews.text: So far it continues to perform without any issues. We will see how it does over the long run. The timer works very accurately.
customer_reviews.author: James Bond

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product
customer_reviews.text: The unit is overheating and then it will stop. Also the cookware that came with it is not a quality product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Gonen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT WORK. Never did. Always an error message, we thought it was us at first and kept trying but it was in fact the unit. Now we missed the return date.
customer_reviews.author: caty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hot pot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically to make hot pot at home and this is perfect. Easy to setup and use. Can boil things very quickly. Best part is that the glass top cleans up so well. Pretty easy to get it looking spotless.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Uhlmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works perfectly! Needed something portable to bring to work when we had parties. I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: My cook unit is possibly defective.
customer_reviews.text: I believe my cook unit may be defective. It shuts off indiscrimatley. I believe I need a replacement unit.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Use in motor home
customer_reviews.text: I use in our motor home. Easy to store. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted less than 4 months. It does not work. I had a lower power induction cooktop. It is still working. Very disappointed with the product. Think carefully before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Paresa

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.text: Stay away. There is a problem with the unit tripping electrical breakers. Throwing a error message that indicates internal over heating.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bridges

customer_reviews.title: I received a used pot from rosewill
customer_reviews.text: The cooktop looked good. But I found that the pot was used, recleaned, and the inner of pot was damaged. I wondered why they shipped the used items to customer.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.text: Works great. I used it outside to steam blue crabs for my guests.
customer_reviews.author: Czeal001

customer_reviews.title: This digital hot plate is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This has served its purpose very well. It performs just like it is intended. I may invest in another one to speed the process of the on the go cooking experience
customer_reviews.author: Euneece J. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: The Pot that came with it was thin and heated too quickly. It works perfect when you buy a nice set of pots to use with it. Love It !
customer_reviews.author: My SHower

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but only with special pans. It’s a little loud (fan noise). Overall, it does what should.
customer_reviews.author: Kath Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Help needed
customer_reviews.text: This induction burner keeps error oh out when on. Hoping to get a refund or a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jc

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This product came 1 day after I ordered it and had free shipping. Mine also came with a $30 gift card from blue apron. Which defiantly makes it worth the value. It does have some draw backs however. You can only adjust the temperature in 50° intervals and I don't think that the temperature in accurate to Fahrenheit since you can brown potatoes at 200°. I would still recommend it though.
customer_reviews.author: Into the void

customer_reviews.title: Nice pan
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't seem to heat the whole pan. Also, the pan is a bit cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: try for any not warking
customer_reviews.text: Why do I just plug in the power supply, etc., but the other function keys do not respond?i try to push any button but no any respond
customer_reviews.author: Deming L.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine for 4 weeks (used weekly) and now shows an error code; additionally, the beep sound with button pushing is unnecessarily loud. I’m not sure, but it also looks like I can’t return it as there is no return option in my “orders” section.
customer_reviews.author: Sishenchong

customer_reviews.title: unkind merchant
customer_reviews.text: I was very angry when I wanted to eat hot pot and found that the stove was broken。dont buy that 。so terrible
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is excellent. Easy to use and very quick to heat.
customer_reviews.author: shan Bai

customer_reviews.title: The pot is not as big as I thought, ...
customer_reviews.text: The pot is not as big as I thought, but it is more than enough for doing the hot pot for 4 or 5 people!
customer_reviews.author: Zhongwei WANG

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is the most terrible cooker and pan I've EVER Cooked with. Waste of money.!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Perfēct
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, easy read digital, many temp settings, fits in small places, great cooking surface with a pretty design on top. Easy clean cooking surface and two prong plug.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn V. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Cheap lousy product
customer_reviews.text: The worst induction cooker EVER! Doesn’t even work for a minute!!! Wasted my time and ruined my holiday! Got E2 message the moment I turned on!!!? Piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 2 months and then stopped heating .
customer_reviews.text: It worked for two months perfectly fine and all of a sudden it just stopped heating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We do like this and use it very often now. It heats up pretty quick and have a few choices for temperature setting. Also it’s really lightweight and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Sun Hailong

customer_reviews.title: Light weight great price
customer_reviews.text: We take outdoor and to parties. Everyone loves the quick heating and light weight.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this item! Works great and easy to clean, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole N.

customer_reviews.title: Okay!
customer_reviews.text: It works! I like using this for cooking in the summer time. It does not heat up my tiny home.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A.

customer_reviews.title: Always get ERROR2
customer_reviews.text: When cooking, it always get ERROR2. :( Anyone else has the same problem?
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Cannot work
customer_reviews.text: It just doesn't works! Shows error 0 all the time...
customer_reviews.author: Yachao Lu

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty pleased with my cooker. Easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.author: OGKali

customer_reviews.title: ... is working so well that I can eat my favorite hotpot! But the pot is very thin and ...
customer_reviews.text: The cooker is working so well that I can eat my favorite hotpot! But the pot is very thin and not in very good quality. If I use the pot to boil water, there are some unknow black things will appear in the pot. So I just use the cooker, It's fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No temperature control, burned after 3rd use
customer_reviews.text: Pot burned after the 3rd use....not sure if it was a defect but such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: No noise, enough capacity. It is convenient to eat hot pot
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Faulty?
customer_reviews.text: Ummmm this thing is waaaayyyy too touchy. Jumps really hot and has no minimal heat setting it seems. I went to return it but was having some trouble and then it was too late...
customer_reviews.author: Marny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It will bring a quart of water to a boil in about 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: steven stafford

customer_reviews.title: Good to use
customer_reviews.text: The power is cooker is good, but the hot pot was hard to clean
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: A induction cooker that cannot last over 10min?
customer_reviews.text: The induction cooker shuts off after 10min and beeps, showing word “E2”
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described in appearance and functionality. The included cookware is of a very utilitarian size. The timer function works like a charm (and is very simple to activate).
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon L. Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Like it very much! It is really good for hotpot making in the wintertime. Suitable for 2-4 people.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to use and clean. Works fast. I live in a warm climate, so, now I can cook and not warm up the kitchen!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: we all enjoy to use this complete set of cooker with pot ...
customer_reviews.text: very fast to heat up. save energy. we all enjoy to use this complete set of cooker with pot for our shabu meal
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L. Poon

product_meta.title: Rosewill 1800 Watt Induction Cooker Cooktop , Included 10" 3.5 Qt 18-8 Stainless Steel Pot, Gold, RHAI-16001
product_meta.description:
Cook with the power of a magnetic field. If you can stick a magnet to your cookware you can cook with our Induction Cooktop. Induction cooker is an energy Efficient cook top. Your cookware heats up faster thus reduce your cooking time. It saves your time, money and use of energy. It also features a three-hour timer setting, beautiful polished crystal plate surface, 1800W and heat up to 450 °F. With the Induction Cooktop, you can braise, deep frying, stir frying, roast, fry, and even boil water. Try our new design Rosewill elegant induction cooker today! 

Specifications 
Color: Black with Gold Pattern
8 Power Levels from 300 to 1800 Watts: 300w, 500w, 700w, 1000w, 1200w, 1400, 1600w, 1800w 
Polished Crystal Plate Surface 
LED Large Screen Display, 4 Digitals 
8 Temperature Settings from 150 to 450°F : 150°F, 200°F, 260°F, 300°F, 350°F, 400°F, 425°F, 450°F 
Three-Hour Timer Setting 
Touching Control Panel 
Cookware Suitability Detection 
Stainless Steel Pot Included 
Overheating Protection Function 
Max. Support Weight: 17.6LBS 
Safety Compliance: ETL/FCC 
Stainless Steel Pot 
Pot Opening Size: 10.83” 
Pot Bottom Size: 7.6” 
Pot Depth: 3.54” 
Capacity: 3.5 Quart 

Please Note: Not every cookware piece will work with induction cooktop. If a magnet sticks well to the sole of the pan, it will work on an induction cooktop. Please avoid using any cookware made with aluminum, glass or copper.
